mapper.insert: insert into regexTbl(name, url, email, password, phoneNumber, residentNumer, CardNumber) values(#{name}, #{url}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{residentNumer}, #{cardNumber})
insert into ifTbl(name, url, email, password, phoneNumber, residentNumer, CardNumber) values(#{name2}, #{url2}, #{email2}, #{password2}, #{phoneNumber2}, #{residentNumer2}, #{cardNumber2})
